column4: how do i  install an external hard drive in ubuntu when it's not recognised on the system?
if it's new, unpartitioned and unformatted .. do that first then it should be recognized.
try a different port in your computer to plug it in.

I'm poking in the dark here but you might look for it using "sudo fdisk -l".. that will give you a list of current partitions and drives and their mount points.. if you see it there but not mounted you'll have to manually mount it.
